message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's better to settle now than lose value later.
Alice, your offer was a bit too one-sided.  Let's be fair - I'll take a slight majority since the value decreases faster for you.
Bob, it's my turn, and time is money! I'll take $55, leaving you with $45. Let's wrap this up before it shrinks further.
